attributes.action: re introduce national service into great briton
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i think this could be an essential element of instilling a sense of national and community pride for the up and coming generations also a sense of identity, stability, confidence and potential futures for the youths who family life isn’t that great. it worked great back in the day, and we need some force to help stabilise the next generation.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
